name: runn1ng_0ut_of_pow3r.exe
description:
runn1ng_0ut_of_pow3r.exe

Spread your malware all over the world, to shut down every single electric circuit.

You start the game by selecting one country/region. You can level your malware by clicking on the button on the bottom left corner, and surrender by clicking at the button on the bottom right corner.

Sorry for bugs and strange behaviour. This game was programmed in 42h for the Ludum Dare game jam.
